item.title: Lecture 10 - Projections
item.description: Meta Key Topics ArcMap Geographic coordinate systems R sf Projected coordinate systems Projecting data Resources Open on ArcMap Processes Functions LP-09 Lecture Slides Lecture Prep 09 Replication Videos From Lecture Scene from The West Wing, Season 2, Episode 16 - “The Gall-Peters Projection” Vox.com - “Why all world maps are wrong” The True Size The interactive mapping tool described during the lecture - “The True Size” - can be found here.
